chapter.text: 102|1|Anata gata wa (zaisan ya musuko nado no) oi koto o hariatte, utsutsuwonukasu.
102|3|Iya, yagate (shigo) anata gata wa (sono shinjitsu o) shirou.
102|4|Moichido iou ka, iya, yagate anata gata wa shirou.
102|5|Iya, anata gata wa (ima ni) hakkiri shiruto yoi nodearu.
102|6|Anata gata wa kanarazu goku hi o miyou.
102|7|Sonotoki anata gata wa sore o meikaku ni me de miru kotodearou.
102|8|Sonohi anata gata wa,(utsutsuwonukashite ita) kyoraku ni tsuite, kanarazu towa rerudearou.
